## FilterSearchResponse.failedVerticals property

Contains error information when one or more verticals fail to return results.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
failedVerticals: {
        verticalConfigId: string;
        errorType: ErrorType;
        details: {
            responseCode: number;
            description: string;
        };
        queryDurationMillis: number;
    }[];
```
